is uh is the ultimate truth at the heart
of creation and that through

from attraction to infatuation to

Detachment to ex Y which is our ground
state the exaltation of our spirit so
love and relationship is a second means
of experiencing spirituality if somebody
doesn't understand spirituality ask them
if they've ever been in love that's the
experience of spirituality I think uh
love can be experienced it's our Natural
Instinct it's the impulse that drives
almost all our Behavior including war
and terrorism um person who's um who's
violent is also asking for love and
asking for attention and yes if you pay
attention to deep listening uh which is
called attention appreciation of all the
good things that life has to offer to

gestures of affection around you and
learn that these gestures are very
natural impulses when we are children
and that's because we haven't yet been
indoctrinated into schisms and fear and
separation then you can remember the
experience of love so rather than saying
can one be taught love I think the
question would be can one remember love
and yes we can I think the path to love
is essentially seeing that all love is
um a movement to higher consciousness
that those that we love and those that
we are repelled by are both mirrors of
ourselves we love those people in whom
we find traits that we want and we are
turned off by people whom whom we find
traits that we deny in ourselves by
looking at love and relationship as a
mirror we can have a better
understanding of ourselves and of others
and through the different stages of love
we can actually find our own
enlightenment
